amendment.description: To reduce the dependence of the United States on imported petroleum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 871 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 213.

action.text: Amendment SA 871 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S7567-7574, S7575-7576; text: CR S7567) To reduce the dependence of the United States on imported petroleum.
